I have done the jimson weed, its exactly like that except, you can concentrate on something for more then 10 seconds.

Id advise people to stay away, it is nothing like acid, mushrooms or DMT. I was still peaking 36 hours later. You have blurry vision for over a week.

I myself have done alot of drugs that make you trip face, but i only done this one time. it scared the hell out of me.

I myself drank it, not smoked it.

It was a sick movie though!

Scaredandbaked- You ARE A FUCKING IDIOT. even mentioning the use of jimson weed as a way to get a 'high' is reckless, irresponsible and downright bordering on deliberate manslaughter. As an Agri-scientist jimson weed can be and is VERY frequently FATAL if ingested by oral or smoke methods.  If not fatal it can cause permanaent irreperable SERIOUS brain damage. When I was in high school  some kids had heard about jimson weed and though they'd give it a try. THREE DIED and a fourth ened up on a respirator for the rest of his drastically shortened life as a veggie.  You want to get high-- at least stick to known shit that causes way less problems like marijuana!  At least some dumbshit kid reading comments here won't end up DEAD from your ignorance.

justracey I agree with what you are saying about jimson weed but scaredandbaked did not say anything wrong. He said he tried it by drinking it and it scared the crap out of him and he tells people NOT to try it. Nothing wrong with writing about his bad experience. Now I actually want to see the movie just to see what all the fuss is about.
